title: Amazon EventBridge Scheduler to Amazon CloudWatch
description: Use EventBridge Scheduler to insert custom metric data into CloudWatch on a schedule

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to use Amazon EventBridge Scheduler to publish your own metrics to CloudWatch on a schedule. This pattern leverages templated targets with EventBridge Scheduler to talk directly to CloudWatch using the PutEvents API operation.
This pattern deploys an EventBridge Schedule and the required IAM resource for Scheduler to interact with CloudWatch.
